definition: a job in an organization, to come into or dock at a wharf
details:
noun
- a job in an organization
= synonyms: spot
- a bed on a ship or train
= synonyms: bunk, built in bed
- a place where a craft can be made fast
= synonyms: slip
verb
- to come into or dock at a wharf
= example: to come into or dock at a wharf
= synonyms: wharf, moor
- to secure in or as if in a berth or dock
= example: to secure in or as if in a berth or dock
= synonyms: moor, tie up
- to provide with an allotted place
= example: to provide with an allotted place
